mapper.select: select t2.depart_name from patrol_plan_organization t1 left join sys_depart t2 on t1.organization_code = t2.org_code where t1.plan_code = #{planCode}

select concat(t2.line_name,"-",t2.station_name,"-",t3.position_name) as stationName from patrol_plan_station t1 left join cs_station t2 on t1.station_code = t2.station_code LEFT JOIN cs_station_position t3 on t2.station_code =t3.staion_code where t1.plan_code = #{code}
select t2.user_name from patrol_task t1 left join patrol_task_user t2 on t1.code = t2.task_code where t2.task_code = #{code}
select t2.org_code from patrol_plan_organization t1 left join sys_depart t2 on t1.organization_code = t2.org_code where t1.plan_code = #{planCode}

select t1.realname as realname, t1.id, t1.org_code from sys_user t1
where t1.org_code = #{code}

SELECT * FROM patrol_task pt WHERE pt.del_flag = 0
and pt.id = #{patrolTaskParam.id}
